summary: More weight variation for Better males.
descriptionHtml:
Check also [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27285]CBBE - More Variation[/url]

<><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
Better Males - MV
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
BETA

SECTIONS

1 - DESCRIPTION
2 - INSTALLATION
3 - KNOWN ISSUES/INCOMPATIBILITIES
4 - CREDITS AND THANKS
5 - PERMISSIONS


1 - DESCRIPTION

First let me inform that english is not my first language. Please be patient with errors and lack of clarity.
This mod is a the male version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27285]CBBE - More Variation[/url]
This mod adds more variation to the weight slider, allowing the creation of characters that range from really skinny to really chubby.
To that purpose, it uses a custom variant of FavoredSoul Better Males body mesh, a custom head mesh, custom textures and a custom malehead.tri to change the head shape with the weight slider.
Those shapes affect all default races. So this mod will change the appearance of all vanilla NPCs and all custom NPCs that use your default body and head mesh.
I consider it still a BETA because the textures are far from good, I'm not not really a texturer. If you are and have interest in making better textures, PM me and I'll share the PSD files with you.


2 - INSTALLATION

a - Download FavoredSoul Meshes from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles[/url] and install it following the included instructions.

b - Download Better Males - MV (the main file in this page). Download with manager and double click it to activate. Or extract the archive and copy the containing meshes and textures folders to your skyrim/data folder, overwrite when needed.
That's it!


3 - KNOWN ISSUES/INCOMPATIBILITIES

There are no armors or clothes for this variant of the body yet, I'll try to adjust them and add to the mod in future updates.
This mod will be incompatible with any mod that changes the default malehead.nif, malehead.tri, malebody_0.nif, malebody_1.nif malehead.dds, malehead_msn.dds, malebody_1.dds, malebody_1_msn.dds files.


4 - CREDITS AND THANKS

Chris57, FavoredSoul and Sundracon for creating "Better Males" - There is a general permission in Better Males page that allow re-use of the resources there and one of the authors confirmed it's validity to me.

Sunspot2 - for creating this mod


5 - PERMISSIONS

Please do not upload this mod in another website without my express consent.
If you want to use resources from this mod PM me for permission.
author: Sunspot2
